posts.post_content:
I'm not a card guy, but as part of my 1903-1927 Yankees collection I acquired a few.  Now it's time for them to go.
First up are three Yankee T205s:  Elberfeld, Criger, Wolter.  I have no idea what they're worth, so if interested, please make an offer.
Thanks!  (Wolter SOLD)

[URL="https://s82.photobucket.com/user/datkatz/media/t205_20181216_0001_zpsf4fxgevl.jpg.html"][IMG]https://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j245/datkatz/t205_20181216_0001_zpsf4fxgevl.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Thanks David......
